format: html
execute:
  echo: true
  warning: false
  message: false
---

```{r}
if (!require(ggplot2)) install.packages("ggplot2")
if (!require(readxl)) install.packages("readxl")

library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)

# Načítanie dát
bolivia <- read_excel("bo.xlsx")

## 5.1 Base R Histogram – distribúcia populácie
hist(bolivia$population,
     main = "Distribúcia populácie bolívijských miest",
     xlab = "Populácia (obyvatelia)",
     col = "lightblue",
     border = "white")

## 5.2 Scatter Plot – vzťah medzi zemepisnou šírkou a populáciou
ggplot(data = bolivia, aes(x = lat, y = population)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.7, size = 3, colour = "blue") +
  geom_smooth(color = "gray") +
  labs(title = "Vzťah medzi zemepisnou šírkou a populáciou",
       x = "Zemepisná šírka",
       y = "Populácia (obyvatelia)") +
  theme_minimal()

## 5.3 Boxplot – porovnanie populácie podľa departmentu (admin_name)
ggplot(data = bolivia, aes(x = admin_name, y = population, fill = admin_name)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Porovnanie populácie podľa departmentu",
       x = "Department",
       y = "Populácia (obyvatelia)") +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

## 5.4 Facet – histogram populácie rozdelený podľa departmentu
ggplot(data = bolivia, aes(x = population)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 15, fill = "coral", color = "black") +
  facet_wrap(~ admin_name) +
  labs(title = "Distribúcia populácie podľa departmentov",
       x = "Populácia (obyvatelia)",
       y = "Počet miest")

## 5.5 Export – uloženie obľúbeného grafu (scatter plot)
scatter_plot <- ggplot(data = bolivia, aes(x = lat, y = population)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.7, size = 3, colour = "blue") +
  geom_smooth(color = "gray") +
  labs(title = "Vzťah medzi zemepisnou šírkou a populáciou",
       x = "Zemepisná šírka",
       y = "Populácia (obyvatelia)") +
  theme_minimal()

ggsave("scatter_population_lat.png", plot = scatter_plot, width = 8, height = 6)
```
